title: Account recovery
body: was told to provide a email not linked to any league account to submit a new ticket but i have no idea on what to do now

replies.body: No worries, I can help.  You'll want to fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) in this case.  It will allow you to submit an address we can reach you at without logging into the ticketing center.

Hello um, can you explain to me why I got banned right after a couple days of submitting my account recovery thing because I explained I canâ€™t go into the email in this account due to it not being mine and was changed, then I get banned and told to go to the email I cannot access which you guys from riot should know and 
I am panicking about my account because I have been playing this game for two years and a half and have invested heavily to the game and I wish to know why I was banned without an explanation

I can't go into details on a public forum, but the lock on the account can be recovered.  The [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) will allow you to use an email you do have access to, which is preferred by our account team.  Make sure to fill it out so our account specialists can help you directly.
